se.soprasteria.automatedtesting.webdriver.helpers.utility.mail

Class MailClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.soprasteria.automatedtesting.webdriver.helpers.utility.mail.MailClient

  • public class MailClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Easy Mail Client Example usage: Store store = MailClient.getInstance().connect("ott.autotest1@gmail.com", "b1ppb0pp100Q", "src/test/java/resources/mail.properties"); Message msg = MailClient.getInstance().getLastMessageFrom(store, "noreply@teliasonera.com"); //... do anything with this message if (msg != null) { String text = msg.getContent().toString(); String subj = msg.getSubject(); } MailClient.getInstance().disconnect(store);
